SV023.SV023_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal24"/][UE:Meta key="af177b6237404eb4abec168071d0b1ec" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Heeey,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] thanks for taking the time to
rescue me.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal24"/]Sammy[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="af177b6237404eb4abec168071d0b1ec" Scale="1"/]I can usually be found researching cheery
blue skies,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] moody rain clouds...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You know,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
all that weather stuff.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="af177b6237404eb4abec168071d0b1ec" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]This planet has mighty nice weather.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's
so pleasant all the time![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="af177b6237404eb4abec168071d0b1ec" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]Clear skies just make you feel good.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's
as if your worries and cares clear up too.
SV023.SV023_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal24"/][UE:Meta key="39e31a33da524ec9af9d8f92dd8e37c6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladTalk"/]Rescue work is extremely important.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Just
make sure you take a break to appreciate
the sky every now and then too!
SV023.SV023_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal24"/][UE:Meta key="41e22b249a75431d9df39c56ea591f67" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Another beautiful sunny day![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Makes me
want to curl up on a blanket and take a
long nap.
SV023.SV023_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal24"/][UE:Meta key="aa067a289aab43d7afd3b3536f6a79f8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]What a gorgeous day![etc:Wait frame="15"/] It doesn't matter
what day or what time...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I always find the
sky simply enchanting![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="aa067a289aab43d7afd3b3536f6a79f8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]When it's bright and blue overhead,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's
because the air is clear.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Weather like this
is always welcome as far as I'm concerned![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="aa067a289aab43d7afd3b3536f6a79f8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladTalk"/]We only get about one day of sunshine per
year where I'm from.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I can't get enough of
these constant blue skies!
SV023.SV023_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal24"/][UE:Meta key="99d2d87b905548fdb49009c31f8c62c6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Where I come from,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the weather can get
really dangerous,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and the sky is almost
always hidden behind gloomy clouds![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="99d2d87b905548fdb49009c31f8c62c6" Scale="1"/]It rains a lot,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] with tons of lightning,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and
hail and snow are everyday occurrences.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="99d2d87b905548fdb49009c31f8c62c6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]It's been refreshing to discover that it
isn't like that here.
SV023.SV023_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal24"/][UE:Meta key="453f719ac2a249fb871246053e465d42" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Have you watched a sunset on this planet
yet?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It was the first time I've ever seen
one so clearly![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="453f719ac2a249fb871246053e465d42" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]I mean,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've seen pictures in books before,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
but wow...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] So that's what a sunset looks
like in person!
SV023.SV023_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal24"/][UE:Meta key="a0635783b8494cb29d0790cc2cac4228" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]The starry skies here are just stunning.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
This is the first time I've seen ones quite
like this![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a0635783b8494cb29d0790cc2cac4228" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]We never get clear nights like this on my
home planet.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I wish I could share them
with my family,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] even just once.
SV023.SV023_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal24"/][UE:Meta key="6568e603657b41859b796b710d2b5cd3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]There were once land masses on my
home world,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but the rains came and
submerged all of it.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Every last bit![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6568e603657b41859b796b710d2b5cd3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]The engineers of the past used incredible
ingenuity to build artificial islands for us
to live on.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Isn't that impressive?
SV023.SV023_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal24"/][UE:Meta key="91c19104c40e4e419692500686ee07ed" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladTalk"/]Rescue work is extremely important.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Just
make sure you take a break to appreciate
the sky every now and then too!
SV023.SV023_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal24"/][UE:Meta key="f334ecc13c0c4ad1a6c81da69d2d4cbc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Another beautiful sunny day![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Makes me
want to curl up on a blanket and take a
long nap.
SV023.SV023_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal24"/][UE:Meta key="b92477444a2e44bbb1958870f2f4423f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Look at your eyes![etc:Wait frame="15"/] They remind me of a
clear blue sky without a single cloud in it!
SV023.SV023_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal24"/][UE:Meta key="1722b7d935724b318ad87098ba5babf2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Your fur is just like...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] What's it like?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I know.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
Cirrocumulus clouds![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Wispy...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]but also soft
and fluffy!
SV023.SV023_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal24"/][UE:Meta key="4aed3f3951be494f8ed5b5ed9c46e4a5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]We're practically identical![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Tell meâ€”do you
like clouds too?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Which do you prefer,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
cirrus or cirrostratus?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4aed3f3951be494f8ed5b5ed9c46e4a5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02FaceOnly"/]I love cirrus clouds![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I just enjoy sitting
back and watching them soar up high!
